CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Brookfield Business Partners L.P. Limited Partnership Units

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 73 FRONT STREET,5TH FLOOR, HAMILTON, HM 12, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Brookfield Business Partners LP is a business services and industrials company. It focused on operating businesses that are either low-cost producers and benefit from high barriers to entry. The company's operating segment includes Business services; Infrastructure services; Industrials and Corporate and others. It generates maximum revenue from the Business Services segment. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the United Kingdom and also has a presence in the United States of America; Europe; Australia; Canada; Brazil; Mexico and Other Countries.
